house_listing.house_description: This is a great starter home if you are trying to put your family in one of the most sought after school districts in va beach. Large treed lot, well established neighborhood. Heat & ac new in '94, hot water heater new in '97. Lillian not a thru street. $1000 carpet allowance w/full price offer
house_listing.residential_listing_-_additional_feature: Attic, Cable TV, Fenced, Ranch Style, Utility Room
